tests.name: 02 command
tests.run: grep -q -P '(?=.*awk|grep)(?=.*#)(?=.*d_melanogaster)' command/command02.sh  && grep -q -P '(?=.*awk|grep)(?=.*#)(?=.*d_melanogaster)(?=.*result02_2)' command/command02.sh  && grep -q -P '(?=.*awk|grep)(?=.*#)(?=.*d_melanogaster)(?=.*result02_3)' command/command02.sh  && echo "correct"

tests.name: 04 command
tests.run: grep -q -P '(?=.*awk|grep)(?=.*#)(?=.*d_melanogaster)(?=.*\$3)(?=.*sort)(?=.*uniq -c)' command/command04.sh && grep -q -P '(?=.*awk|grep)(?=.*#)(?=.*d_melanogaster)(?=.*\$3)(?=.*gene)(?=.*Gfat1)' command/command04.sh && grep -q -P '(?=.*awk|grep)(?=.*#)(?=.*d_melanogaster)(?=.*\$3)(?=.*transcript)(?=.*Gfat1)(?=.*tr -d)(?=.*\$12)' command/command04.sh && grep -q -P '(?=.*awk|grep)(?=.*#)(?=.*d_melanogaster)(?=.*\$3)(?=.*exon)(?=.*Gfat1)(?=.*\$9)(?=.*tr -d)(?=.*\$14)(?=.*\$14)' command/command04.sh && grep -q -P '(?=.*awk|grep)(?=.*-F)(?=.*\\t)(?=.*\$5)(?=.*\$4)(?=.*\$9)' command/command04.sh && grep -q -P '(?=.*awk|grep)(?=.*BEGIN)(?=.*END)(?=.*\$15)' command/command04.sh && echo "correct"

tests.name: 05 command
tests.run: grep -q -P '(?=.*wget)(?=.*d_melanogaster_old.genes.gtf.gz)(?=.*ftp://ftp.ensembl.org)(?=.*BDGP6.87.gtf.gz)(?=.*release-87)' command/command05.sh  && grep -q -P '(?=.*gunzip)(?=.*d_melanogaster_old)' command/command05.sh  && grep -q -P '(?=.*awk|grep)(?=.*#)' command/command05.sh  && grep -q -P '(?=.*awk|grep)(?=.*BEGIN)(?=.*\$3)(?=.*\$7)(?=.*END)' command/command05.sh  && grep -q -P '(?=.*awk|grep)(?=.*#)(?=.*\$3)' command/command05.sh  && grep -q -P '(?=.*sort)' command/command05.sh  && grep -q -P '(?=.*uniq -c)' command/command05.sh  && grep -q -P '(?=.*awk|grep)(?=.*\$2)(?=.*\$1)' command/command05.sh  && grep -q -P '(?=.*join.awk)(?=.*result05_3_1)(?=.*result04_1)(?=.*>)(?=.*result05_3_3)' command/command05.sh  && echo "correct"
